EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pluralsight-Seroter_Q417.Email for Partner Pluralsight instead of
EmailTemplate.subject: 11/16 Webinar - Creating a Cloud-Native Transformation at Scale
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us <[[https://www.pluralsight.com/resource-center/webinars/cloud_native_transformation?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=uberflip-promo]]> for the webinar, Creating a Cloud-Native Transformation at Scale <[[https://www.pluralsight.com/resource-center/webinars/cloud_native_transformation?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=uberflip-promo]]>, on November 16, 2017.
Your customers are demanding better experiences powered by thoughtful software. If your organization is going to deliver, it’s time to roll out a cloud-native transformation strategy that scales.
Are you ready?
Join Pivotal and Pluralsight in this live webinar to learn:
- How innovative companies deliver better user experiences by moving fast and staying resilient
- The role of impactful learning in making a cloud-native transformation happen
- What it really means to create a long-lasting, software-driven transformation at scale
Join the discussion with Richard and learn how to get started on your journey now.
Presenter: Richard Seroter, Senior Director of Product for Pivotal
Date: Thursday, November 16, 2017 Time: 10:00am PST / 1:00pm EST
ATTEND <[[https://www.pluralsight.com/resource-center/webinars/cloud_native_transformation?utm_source=pivotal&utm_medium=uberflip-promo]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2017 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
